entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Cambridge Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:11 p.m. MDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, -0.8Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cambridge Bay Airport 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 10 May 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Rain
Temperature: -0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 6 km
Humidity: 94 %

Dewpoint: -1.7°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow or freezing rain. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to periods of snow early this evening and ending near midnight then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
